zone.element: The WAJAF Examples -  - Control Center with XML files.

help.title: Ajax Status flag
help.description:
The flag is green when there is no AJAX request.
If there is an AJAX request on the go, the flag turns red during the request.

help.title: Drag&Drop Status flag
help.description:
The flag is green when there is no D&D movement.
If there is a D&D movement on the go, the flag turns red during the dragging.

help.summary: Click to open the debug console
help.title: Debug console
help.description:
You can click on this button to open the debug console.
The debug console is a popup window. Be sure the popups are authorized in your browser to let it appear.

help.summary: Click here to open the configuration screen
help.title: Configuration
help.description:
You can access the configuration screen click on this button.
You can change here the skin of the examples dynamically.

help.summary: Click to change the help status. Wait on the icon to get more information if the help is turned on full status.
help.title: Help level:
help.description:
This option let you change the interactive help status of the system.
The icon is shown when the help is only showing a hint on the element.
The icon is shown when the interactive help is in full mode. In this case, put the mouse over an element first show a rapid hint, and waiting 4 seconds will pop a help window that can be navigated.
The icon desactivates all the help.
Click on the icon to switch the interactive help mode to hint/full/none.

help.summary: Click to change the sound status On or Off.
help.title: Sound on/off:
help.description:
This option let you turn the sound of the system on or off.
The icon is shown when the sound is working.
The icon is shown when the sound is turned off.
Click on the icon to switch the sound on or off.

template.name: folder
example

zone.title: Dash Board
zone.element:
Welcome to the WebAbility Javascript Application Framework - WAJAF - v1.

The examples work perfectly under Firefox 3+, Chrome 1+, Safari 4+, Opera 10+ and Internet Explorer 7/8.

The whole examples are build on XML files describing the applications.
You can display the XML code on each example.
WAJAF - The WebAbility® Javascript Application Framework - © 2008-2012 Philippe Thomassigny - http://www.webability.info/?P=wajaf
